channel.title: Docs on Hirokit
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Hirokit

item.description: Get started # Requirements: Docker Go 1.22+ Optional: Tilt Clone starter repository # git clone https://github.com/daarlabs/starter.git Start the app # tilt up # OR docker compose up Your app will be running on localhost Next step # Config

Gox # HTML knowledge required Composable pure function view layer You can use any HTML element as Go func Advice Use import alias import . “github.com/daarlabs/hirokit/gox” Be careful with naming convention to prevent HTML nodes names collisions Sample code # package app import ( . "github.com/daarlabs/hirokit/gox" ) func Page() string { return Render( Html( Lang("en"), Head( Title(Text("Example app")), ), Body( H1(Text("Example page")), P(Text("Example paragraph")), ), ), ) } Render # Render function transform Gox nodes to string
